price: 12. « Seigneur, s’écrieront-ils, débarrasse-nous du supplice, nous sommes (devenus) vraiment croyants. »
arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ik'shif ʿannā al-ʿadhāba innā mu'minūna
